theNavi:CyclingStarter.NAME: Cycler 1: Draw
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Cycle 3 NL Gain !B! Block. NL 1: Draw !M! Card. NL 2: [#888888]Apply[] !theNavi:SecondMagic! [#888888]Vulnerable.[] NL 3: [#888888]Apply[] !theNavi:SecondMagic! [#888888]Weak.[]
Cycle 3 NL Gain !B! Block. NL 1: [#888888]Draw[] !M! [#888888]Card. NL 2: Apply !theNavi:SecondMagic! Vulnerable. NL 3: [#888888]Apply[] !theNavi:SecondMagic! [#888888]Weak.[]
Cycle 3 NL Gain !B! Block. NL 1: [#888888]Draw[] !M! [#888888]Card. NL 2: [#888888]Apply[] !theNavi:SecondMagic! [#888888]Vulnerable.[] NL 3: Apply !theNavi:SecondMagic! Weak.

theNavi:CopyCard.NAME: CopyCard
theNavi:CopyCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust.
theNavi:CopyCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a copy of that card into your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

theNavi:HiCannon.NAME: HiCannon
theNavi:HiCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Fuse 2.

theNavi:Guard3.NAME: Guard3
theNavi:Guard3.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.

theNavi:Igniter.NAME: Igniter
theNavi:Igniter.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage to an enemy, apply 1 Burning.

theNavi:Bubbler.NAME: Bubbler
theNavi:Bubbler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.

theNavi:HotBody.NAME: HotBody
theNavi:HotBody.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Your next attack deals !M! more damage.

theNavi:StepSwrd.NAME: StepSwrd
theNavi:StepSwrd.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. Draw !theNavi:SecondMagic! Card.
theNavi:StepSwrd.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Gain !B! Block. Draw !theNavi:SecondMagic! Cards.

theNavi:AbsEssns.NAME: AbsEssns
theNavi:AbsEssns.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! Damage. NL If Fatal get an extra card reward at the end of combat.

theNavi:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theNavi:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theNavi:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theNavi:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theNavi:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theNavi:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theNavi:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theNavi:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theNavi:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !theNavi:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theNavi:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theNavi:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theNavi:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
